roleset.name: impetuous

role.descr: stimulus, subject matter about which arg1 is impetuous

example.name: concatenation/relemmatization required
example.text: As for inter-country affairs , it is useless *PRO* being hot - headed . Strength is what determines everything !

roleset.note: HOTHEADED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from hotheaded.01-j)
This may also occur as 'hot headed' or 'hot-headed'. Concatenate and relemmatize to this roleset as needed. (from hotheaded.01-j)
